price: 11. Bomengo naye ekosalisa ye na eloko te na ntango ya paši.
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
